attributes.comment:
I am writing to request that the date of expiration of the I171 form (needed for
international adoption) be extended from 18 to 24 months. The wait time for us to
adopt a child from China is 18 months AFTER our paperwork arrives in China.
Unconditionally, as the law is now, we will have to refile for this form a second
time! This is obviously time consuming for not only the adoptive parents but our
government employees! We then have to pay all the necessary filing fees involved
with obtaining a new I171 form adding up to hundreds of dollars (on top of an
already horrendously expensive process). Please consider the huge number of
American adoptive parents who are already mentally, financially and often
physically stressed from this international adoption process and make this step in
the process a ONE step process. Obtaining this form twice just doesn't make
sense for anyone involved - the citizens or the government. Thank you!
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Rebecca J. McIntyre
